jobTitle: Tutor, SAT or ACT Math Section Specialist - 50/hr-55/hr (Remote)

company.name: Association of Test Preparation, Admissions, and Private Tutoring

industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
TPAPT, a national consortium of locally-owned and operated tutoring and college advising programs, is seeking SAT and ACT Math Section Specialists to help tutor students in grades 10-12. The SAT or ACT Math Section Specialist will be responsible for providing high-quality remote instruction to students preparing for the Math Section of the SAT or ACT exams.

Role: Test Prep Math Specialist

Classification: Contract (1099)

Seniority: Mid-Senior Level

Compensation: $50/hr-$55hr commensurate

Responsibilities

  • Deliver personalized lessons for the Math Section of either/both the SAT or the ACT exams
  • Identify individual learning styles and adapt instruction accordingly
  • Develop and implement strategies for improving students' test scores
  • Provide guidance and mentorship to students to achieve their academic goals
  • Monitor student progress and provide regular feedback to parents and/or guardians
  • Attend training and development sessions to enhance skills and knowledge


Requirements

  • You have a curriculum and have planned and delivered SAT or ACT Math lessons online in the past
  • Earned Bachelor's degree
  • Demonstrable expertise in the Math Section of either/both the SAT or ACT exam
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills
  • Ability to adapt teaching methods to individual learning styles
  • Passion for education and desire to help students succeed


Benefits

  • Tutoring rate: $50/hr-$55/hr
  • Cross-teaching assignments available (Academic Math)
  • Working for an established company
  • Opportunity to help students achieve their college goals
  • No marketing
